alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 830 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt. This storm was drifting southeast near 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oceanway and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
